name: Anton Dvorson
summary: Professional software architect with 10+ years of expertise in Node.js and React ecosystems, specializing in high-traffic e-commerce platforms and scalable cloud solutions. Proven track record in leading technical teams, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and deploying applications across AWS, Azure, and private cloud infrastructures.

experience.title: Solution Architect on KDI-HEAD
experience.description: Spearheaded architecture and development of a high-performance Progressive Web Application leveraging Next.js and Magento's GraphQL API. Implemented server-side rendering, responsive design, and robust CI/CD pipelines for enterprise e-commerce standards.
responsibilities: Developed end-to-end solution architecture for complex enterprise requirements
Collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical specifications
Built and optimized CI/CD pipelines reducing time-to-market
Provided technical leadership and mentorship to development team
Integrated modern web technologies for enhanced performance and user engagement
experience.technologies: Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, Apollo Client, Magento GraphQL, Material UI, Playwright, Redis, Azure, GitHub Actions, NewRelic

experience.title: Developer on LIBG-DAWN
experience.project: Multimedia Hub for Set Top Box
experience.description: Developed centralized household Multimedia Hub providing access to live broadcasting, VOD, recordings, and third-party applications with full interoperability between devices.
responsibilities: Developed EFL graphics components for UI display from Node.js on set top box hardware
Integrated and optimized UI functionalities on embedded Linux systems
Ensured seamless Node.js and EFL interaction for enhanced performance
Designed efficient solutions for embedded system constraints
Implemented advanced debugging with Prometheus and Grafana
experience.technologies: Node.js, Embedded Linux, EFL, Prometheus, Grafana

experience.title: Full-stack Developer, DevOps
experience.description: Developed heavy equipment marketplace web application with advanced search, payment processing, and secure infrastructure for US-based customer.
responsibilities: Fixed GraphQL-based user location procedures and improved stepper UI components
Enhanced Elasticsearch suggestions with entity splitting and performance optimization
Improved email/chat notifications and order refund processes
Tightened infrastructure security for payment compliance with vulnerability scanning
Migrated deployment from BitBucket Pipelines to AWS CodeDeploy with VPN setup
experience.technologies: Elasticsearch, GraphQL, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Docker, AWS, Redis, Material UI, Strapi, Stripe, Plaid, MongoDB

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Developed cloud editorial tools for Sweden's top-2 news publisher, creating microservices for analytics, competitor monitoring, and content management systems.
responsibilities: Built Node.js and React SSR microservices for article analytics and dashboards
Created Puppeteer-based screenshot service with Amazon S3 integration
Developed popular photo manipulation tool using Konva.js with advanced cropping features
Migrated EPiServer features to modular React/Redux + Node monolith
Led deployment migration from Basefarm to OpenShift managed Kubernetes
experience.technologies: Node.js, React, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Puppeteer, Amazon S3, Konva.js, d3.js, Elasticsearch

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Developed Russia's largest online payment service, implementing new component-based design system and payment card processes.
responsibilities: Implemented component-based design system using Node.js and Fullstack BEM
Created A/B testing experiment pages and payment process markup
Developed BFF business logic for payment flows
Worked on physical and virtual plastic bank card issuing processes
Implemented user statistics aggregation systems

experience.title: Full-stack Developer, CNC Commissioning
experience.description: Developed web platform for digital manufacturing startup enabling 3D model upload with instant quoting and visualization, while managing CNC machine operations.
responsibilities: Built Three.js-based 3D model visualization with volume and dimension calculations
Migrated platform from YII PHP framework to Node.js REST API architecture
Added admin interface for e-commerce functionality and websocket chat system
Integrated social media content feeds to main page
Managed commissioning and maintenance team for dozen CNC machines
experience.technologies: Three.js, YII PHP, Node.js, REST API, WebSocket, MongoDB
